sentences.en: After the event, old ruffian gave A a few candy.
sentences.cn: 事后, 老光棍给了A几粒糖果.

sentences.en: He himself was a bad commander, a boaster and ruffian.
sentences.cn: 他本人是个弊脚的指挥官, 会吹牛皮,又粗鲁残暴.

sentences.en: He whomped the ruffian on the skull.
If that ruffian does not mend his ways, he will come to the gallows some day.
sentences.cn: 如果那个恶棍不改邪归正的话, 他总有一天会上绞刑架的.

sentences.en: If you marry this ruffian, I wash my hands of you forever!
sentences.cn: 如果你和这个凶恶的家伙结婚, 我就永远拒绝接受你!

sentences.en: That ruffian is capable of any crime.
sentences.cn: 那个恶棍什么勾当都做得出来.

sentences.en: The mere thought of the ruffian made her shudder.
sentences.cn: 她一想到那个恶棍就不寒而栗.

sentences.en: The ruffian dealt his victim a savage blow on the tead, that did for her.
sentences.cn: 暴徒猛击受害者的头部致死.

sentences.en: The ruffian flicked the knife open.
sentences.cn: 歹徒用手腕轻轻一振亮出刀刃.

sentences.en: The ruffian laid about in desperation.
sentences.cn: 歹徒在绝望中向四周乱打一气.

sentences.en: The ruffian threatened to run his victim through if he did not hand over all his money.
sentences.cn: 暴徒恐吓受害者说如果他不把所有的钱都交出来,就捅死他.

sentences.en: The tiger says: Is you think you have a young ruffian Wu Song?
sentences.cn: 老虎说: 你以为你有根小棍儿就是武松了?

sentences.en: What a rascal and rogue, a ruffian and villain!
sentences.cn: 真是个无赖,流氓, 恶棍,坏人!

sentences.en: With woman steps she followed : the ruffian and his strolling mort.
sentences.cn: 她迈着女性的步子跟在后边,恶棍和共闯江湖的姘头.
